data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Shaoxiong, Liu, Linjian, Huang, Xiaofang, Zhu, Yuye, Xu, Yanqin (2017): A taxonomic revision of three Chinese spurless species of genus Epimedium L. (Berberidaceae). PhytoKeys 78: 23-36, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.78.11640, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.78.11640
